name: Ribbon Meat Loaf
comments: We always made Scalloped Potatoes as a side dish for this; I can't imagine the two separate. That's why I also included that recipe! :) Ketchup goes nicely on top of both the meat loaf and the potatoes, but that's more my personal opinion.
ingredients: 3 slices soft bread, torn into small pieces
1/4 tsp. each: pepper, dry mustard, sage, celery salt and garlic salt
instructions: Stir together bread and milk. Mix in remaining meat ingredients. Pat 1/2 meat mixture into greased loaf pan, 9x5x3. Cover with cheese filling. Top with remaining meat mixture.
